sections.text:
The South Carolina Department of Labor, Licensing and Regulation is authorized to purchase and issue clothing to the staff of the State Fire Academy.

HISTORY: 2008 Act No. 353, Section 2, Pt 17B, eff July 1, 2009; 2022 Act No. 170 (S.460), Section 9, eff May 16, 2022.

Effect of Amendment

2022 Act No. 170, Section 9, reenacted the section with no apparent change.
